What's up with the time Alex?

I checked my clock to make sure I had the right time zone, checked it and everything, and it's still one hour behind my clock here in the land of Oz!

Matthew G.

Posts.EditableText: I know.  I'm in Melbourne, Australia.  my GMT is + 10:00.  Everything is still an hour early!
